member.summary: Indicates if objects are equal

member.summary: If objects are not equal then this value holds the property path to first different properties

member.name: T:Qhta.TypeUtils.ObjectComparer
member.summary: Utility class to object deep comparison

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.ObjectComparer.AreEqual(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Compares two objects in deep. All public read/write properties are compared except those marked with NonComparable attribute. If objects are different then diffPath is returned with a property path to first different properties. If objects are of different type then diffPath is "@Type".

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.ObjectComparer.AreEqualAsync(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Asynchronous object comparison

member.name: T:Qhta.TypeUtils.ObjectCopier
member.summary: Reference Article http://www.codeproject.com/KB/tips/SerializedObjectCloner.aspx Provides a method for performing a deep copy of an object. Binary Serialization is used to perform the copy.

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.ObjectCopier.Clone``1(``0)
member.summary: Perform a deep Copy of the object.
member.typeparam: The type of object being copied.
member.returns: The copied object.

member.name: T:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategory
member.summary: Specific categories of types

member.name: F:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategory.Simple
member.summary: A simple type (type has no members)

member.name: F:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategory.Textual
member.summary: String or character type

member.name: F:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategory.Logical
member.summary: logical operations enabled (e.g. boolean)

member.name: F:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategory.Numeral
member.summary: Arithmetic operations enabled

member.name: F:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategory.Signed
member.summary: Signed numeral

member.name: F:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategory.Unsigned
member.summary: Unsigned numeral

member.name: F:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategory.Integer
member.summary: Integer numeral

member.name: F:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategory.Fixed
member.summary: Fixed decimal position numeral

member.name: F:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategory.Float
member.summary: Float decimal position numeral

member.name: F:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategory.Temporal
member.summary: DateTime or TimeSpan

member.name: F:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategory.Enumerable
member.summary: Enumerable type

member.name: F:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategory.Nullable
member.summary: Nullable type

member.name: T:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization
member.summary: A static class that evaluates category of a type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.GetCategory(System.Type)
member.summary: Categorization of a type
member.returns: a of a type or 0 if not known

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsSimple(System.Type)
member.summary: Is a type a simple type? A simple type is string, char, boolean, all numeral types, date/time, time span and guid type. Also an enum type is a simple type.
member.returns: true if a type is a simple type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsTextual(System.Type)
member.summary: Is a type a textual type, i.e. string or char type
member.returns: true if a type is a textual type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsNumeral(System.Type)
member.summary: Is a type a numeral type, i.e. integer or float or decimal type
member.returns: true if a type is a numeral type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsEqualOrSubclassOf(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Shortcut of type equality comparison or IsSubclassOf function

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsNullable(System.Type)
member.summary: Is a type a nullable type, i.e. it's name starts with "Nullable`1".
member.returns: true if a type is a nullable type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsNullable(System.Type,System.Type@)
member.summary: Checks if a type is a nullable type, i.e. it's name starts with "Nullable`1" and returns it's base type
member.param: based type of the nullable type
member.returns: true if a type is a nullable type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsArray(System.Type)
member.summary: Is a type an array type.
member.returns: true if a type is an array type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsArray(System.Type,System.Type@)
member.summary: Is a type an array type. If so it returns the item type of the array.
member.param: returned item type if a type is an array
member.returns: true if a type is an array type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsArray(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Is a type an array type. If so it check the item type of the array.
member.param: checked item type if a type is an array
member.returns: true if a type is an array type of item Type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsList(System.Type)
member.summary: Is a type a list type, i.e. it's name starts with "List`1" or if it is a defined type which implements a IList`1 interface.
member.returns: true if a type is a list type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsList(System.Type,System.Type@)
member.summary: Checks if a type a list type, i.e. it's name starts with "List`1" or if it is a defined type which implements a IList`1 interface. If so it returns the item type of the list.
member.param: returned item type if a type is a list
member.returns: true if a type is a list type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsList(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Is a type an list type, i.e. it's name starts with "List`1" or if it is a defined type which implements a IList`1 interface. If so it check the item type of the collection.
member.param: checked item type if a type is a list
member.returns: true if a type is an enumerable type of item Type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsCollection(System.Type)
member.summary: Is a type a collection type, i.e. it's name starts with "Collection`1" or if it is a defined type which implements a ICollection`1 interface.
member.returns: true if a type is a collection type

member.summary: Is a type a collection type, i.e. it's name starts with "Collection`1" or if it is a defined type which implements a ICollection`1 interface. If so it returns the item type of the collection.
member.param: returned item type if a type is a collection
member.returns: true if a type is a collection type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsCollection(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Is a type a collection type, i.e. it's name starts with "Collection`1" or if it is a defined type which implements a ICollection`1 interface. If so it checks the item type of the collection.
member.param: checked item type if a type is a collection
member.returns: true if a type is a collection type of item type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsEnumerable(System.Type)
member.summary: Is a type an enumerable type, i.e. it's name starts with "Enumerable`1" or if it is a defined type which implements a IEnumerable`1 interface.
member.returns: true if a type is an enumerable type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsEnumerable(System.Type,System.Type@)
member.summary: Is a type an enumerable type, i.e. it's name starts with "Enumerable`1" or if it is a defined type which implements a IEnumerable`1 interface. If so it returns the item type of the collection.
member.param: returned item type if a type is an enumerable
member.returns: true if a type is an enumerable type

member.summary: Is a type an enumerable type, i.e. it's name starts with "Enumerable`1" or if it is a defined type which implements a IEnumerable`1 interface. If so it check the item type of the collection.

member.returns: true if a type is an enumerable type of item Type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeCategorization.IsDictionary(System.Type)
member.summary: Is a type a dictionary type, i.e. it's name starts with "Dictionary`2" or if it is a defined type which implements a IDictionary`2 interface.
member.returns: true if a type is a dictionary type

returned value type if a type is a dictionary
member.returns: true if a type is a dictionary type

member.summary: Is a type a dictionary type, i.e. it's name starts with "Dictionary`2" or if it is a defined type which implements a IDictionary`2 interface. If so it checks the key type and the value type of the dictionary.
member.param: checked key type if a type is a dictionary
checked value type if a type is a dictionary
member.returns: true if a type is a dictionary type of key and value type

member.summary: Is a type a key value pair type, i.e. it's name starts with "KeyValuePair`2"
member.returns: true if a type is a key value pair type

returned value type if a type is a key value pair

member.name: T:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeNaming
member.summary: More friendy type names

member.name: T:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance
member.summary: Extension methods for getting members in order of inheritance

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetMembersByInheritance(System.Type)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetMembers method. The members are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetMembersByInheritance(System.Type,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetMembers method in case when a parameter does not have option BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly. Then members are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetMethodsByInheritance(System.Type)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetMethods method. The methods are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetMethodsByInheritance(System.Type,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetMethods(BindingFlags) method in case when a parameter does not have option BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly. Then methods are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetMethodByInheritance(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetMethod(string) method. The methods are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetMethodByInheritance(System.Type,System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetMethod(string, BindingFlags) method in case when a parameter does not have option BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly. Then methods are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetMethodByInheritance(System.Type,System.String,System.Type[])
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetMethod(string, Type[]) method. The methods are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetMethodByInheritance(System.Type,System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Type[])
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetMethod(string, BindingFlags, Type[]) method in case when a parameter does not have option BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly. Then methods are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetPropertiesByInheritance(System.Type)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetProperties method. The properties are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetPropertiesByInheritance(System.Type,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetProperties(BindingFlags) method in case when a parameter does not have option BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly. Then properties are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetPropertyByInheritance(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetProperty(string) method. The properties are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetPropertyByInheritance(System.Type,System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetProperty(string, BindingFlags) method in case when a parameter does not have option BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly. Then properties are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetFieldsByInheritance(System.Type)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetFields method. The properties are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetFieldsByInheritance(System.Type,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetFields(BindingFlags) method in case when a parameter does not have option BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly. Then properties are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetFieldByInheritance(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetField(string) method. The properties are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetFieldByInheritance(System.Type,System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetField(string, BindingFlags) method in case when a parameter does not have option BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly. Then properties are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order (from top superclass first).

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetCustomAttibutesByInheritance(System.Type,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetCustomAttributes method in case when an parameter is set for true Then attributes are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order.
member.param: A type which attributes are searched
Should inherited attributes be ordered first?
member.returns: A table of attributes

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeReflectionByInheritance.GetCustomAttibutesByInheritance``1(System.Type,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replacement for a Type.GetCustomAttributes method in case when an parameter is set for true Then attributes are taken also from superclasses, but are also ordered with inheritance order. Only attributes of a specified type are returned.
member.param: A type which attributes are searched
Should inherited attributes be ordered first?
member.returns: A table of attributes

member.name: T:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils
member.summary: Helper functions that operate on types and supplement System.Reflection library

member.name: T:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.CopyPropertyMethod
member.summary: A delegate method for property copying

member.name: F:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.KnownTypeConverters
member.summary: A list of known type converters for TryGetConverter method. Is filled after successful invoke of TryGetConverter. Can be preset by a developer.

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.GetTopmostMethod(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: When a class defines a new method with the same name as an inherited method, a "GetMethod" function return an error. This "GetTopmostMethod" method searches the original class first and if it will not find a method, then searches the base class recursively.

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.IsDefaultValue(System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if the given value is the default value of the given type

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.TryGetEnumValue(System.Type,System.String,System.Object@)
member.summary: Converts string to enum value for an enum type. Returns false if no enum value recognized

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.TrySetValue(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Safely sets a property of the target object to some value. Invokes TryGetConverter method.
member.param: property info as get from type reflection

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.TryGetConverter(System.Type,System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter@)
member.summary: Tries to get an instance of a value converter for a type using a TypeConverterAttribute of the given type.

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.TryConvertValue(System.Type,System.Object,System.Object@)
member.summary: Tries to convert a value of the given type using its converter ConvertFrom method

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.TryParseEnum(System.Type,System.String,System.Object@)
member.summary: Tries to convert enum string to enum value

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.GetElementType(System.Type)
member.summary: Expanded method with

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.HasProperty(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Determine if a type has property with a specified name. Equivalent to type.GetProperty(name) != null.

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.HasProperty(System.Type,System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Determine if a type has property with a specified name using BindingFlags. Equivalent to type.GetProperty(name, flags) != null.

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.GetValueType(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: If memberInfo is PropertyInfo it returns PropertyType. Either if memberInfo is FieldInfo it returns FieldType. Otherwise it returns null.

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.CanWrite(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: If memberInfo is PropertyInfo it returns PropertyInfo.CanWrite. Either if memberInfo is FieldInfo it returns negated FieldInfo.IsInitOnly. Otherwise it returns null.

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.IsIndexer(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: If memberInfo is PropertyInfo it checks if it is indeksed property Otherwise it returns false.

member.name: M:Qhta.TypeUtils.TypeUtils.Redefines(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Checking in a member redefinines a member.
member.param: info of a member that redefines
info of a member that is redefined
